newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-PROSINECKI MOVES TO SEVILLA AFTER PAYMENT HICCUP.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-PROSINECKI MOVES TO SEVILLA AFTER PAYMENT HICCUP.

text.p: Croatian midfielder Robert Prosinecki finally joined Sevilla on Friday after a hiccup in the payment of the 174 million pesetas ($1.34 million) transfer fee.

"I've done a lot of transfers in my life...and I've never seen a situation like this," said Barcelona vice-president Joan Gaspart who extended the time limit for payment to 3pm on Friday after the first cheques bounced.
Gaspart said that on Thursday the club had received a fax which explained that the cheques deposited by Sevilla "couldn't be processed through lack of funds".
Prosinecki struggled to find a regular first-team place at Barcelona with Johan Cruyff in charge and has hardly played under new coach Bobby Robson.
